summary: A documentary on the 1883 eruption of Krakatoa in the Sunda Strait of Indonesia, bringing tsunamis, rains of pumice and ash, and a deadly flow of hot steam, sulfuric acid, and ash. More than 36,000 died; survivors had bad burns.
cast: Rupert Penry-Jones|Olivia Williams|Kevin McMonagle|Ramon Tikaram|David Dennis|Lee-Ann Van Rooi|Angelique Kotze|William Miller|Declan Dreyer|Robert Hobbs|Janine Wood|Connor Dowds|Jeremy Crutchley|Bill Flynn|Darrell D'Silva|Michel Johannessen|Muzzammil Moosa|Azhar Mohamed|James MacEwan|Hayley Neethling|Desmond Lai Lan|Farouk Valley-Omar|Dominika Jablonska|Tim Plewman|Michael Brunner|Vera Clare|Sam Miller|Albert Buyco|Simon Winchester
title: Krakatoa: The Last Days
